96586.name: Mortality Improvement

source.dataPublishedBy: Goldring, S., Henretty, N., Mills, J., Johnson, K., & Smallwood, S. (2011). Mortality of the ‘Golden Generation’: What can the ONS Longitudinal Study tell us?. Population trends, 145(1), 203-232.
